title: Swords and Sandals III Solo Ultratus  (Direct)
description:
------------------------------------------------
 Swords.and.Sandals II Solo Ultratus in English
------------------------------------------------
Installation
_________________

1.) Download the torrent provided.
2.) Create a folder on your desktop named "Swords and Sandals III Solo Ultratus.
3.) Once the download is complete go to where the RAR file is situated.
4.) Open the RAR file and extract the contents into the folder now named "Swords and Sandals III Solo Ultratus" on your desktop.
5.) Once the extraction is complete, open the folder and right click the .exe called "ss3_solo_downloadable" and press "Create Shortcut.
6.) Once you have created the short cut drag it to your desktop and rename is to whatever you please e.g. "Swords and Sandals III Solo Ultratus" 
7.) Double click the new shortcut and PLAY!
8.) Have fun (THIS IS NO OPTIONAL)

FULL GAME 
FULL WINDOWS AND MAC SUPPORTED
SINGLEPLAYER ONLY 
FULLY CRACKED AND READY TO PLAY!!!!
